content:
Yes, as an AI language model, I can provide you with information on the different Olympic events that have been added in recent years. Here are some of the most notable events:

1. Skateboarding - This event was introduced in the 2020 Tokyo Olympics, consisting of two disciplines: street and park.

2. Sport Climbing - Also introduced in the 2020 Tokyo Olympics, consisting of three disciplines: speed climbing, bouldering, and lead climbing.

3. 3x3 Basketball - Added to the 2020 Tokyo Olympics as a new basketball event, featuring teams of three players competing on a half-court.

4. Mixed Team Events - Several mixed team events have been added in recent years, including mixed doubles in badminton and tennis, mixed team archery, and mixed team triathlon.

5. Karate - A traditional Japanese martial art, added to the 2020 Tokyo Olympics as a new event.

6. Surfing - A new event added to the 2020 Tokyo Olympics, featuring male and female competitors surfing in waves at the Tsurigasaki Surfing Beach in Japan.

7. Baseball and Softball - Both sports were reintroduced to the 2020 Tokyo Olympics after a 13-year absence.
